_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The four kinds of mindfulness meditation: Meditating by observing an aspect of the body
Meditating by observing an aspect of feelings
Meditating by observing an aspect of mind
Meditating by observing an aspect of principles
The cause and reason why the true teachi: Not developing and cultivating the four kinds of mindfulness meditation
The true teaching doesn't last long after the final extinguishment of the Realized One
Developing and cultivating the four kinds of mindfulness meditation
The true teaching does last long after the final extinguishment of the Realized One
